articles.author: Melissa Rudy
articles.title: Want to live longer? Follow 8 heart-healthy habits, says the American Heart Association - Fox News
articles.description: Making several specific lifestyle changes could slow biological aging by six years, according to a new study by the American Heart Association (AHA). Fox News Digital details the results.
articles.content:
Making several specific lifestyle changes
 could slow biological aging by six years, according to the American Heart Association (AHA).
